tourBios.exmtStatus: Conditional - Finished T137 at 2015 Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament
tourBios.carHigh: 2014: Was T2 at the Mackenzie Tour Qualifying School in California to earn exempt status...Earned top-10 finish at the ATB Financial Open in his seventh start, with opening rounds of 67-64 (T10)...Moved up the leaderboard with a T7 at the Bayview Place Island Savings Open, the second event of the Mackenzie Tour season.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Earned seven individual wins during his collegiate career at Stetson University...Won the 2012 Atlantic Sun Conference individual championship.
tourBios.personal: Two-time Academic All-American at Stetson University...Enjoys basketball and tennis...Dream foursome would include Tiger Woods, Ben Hogan and Arnold Palmer...Not many people know that he has "a silky jumpshot."

tourBios.carHigh:
2015: Finished T4 after getting into the final group at the Syncrude Boreal Open...Continued strong play with a T8 finish at The Players Cup...Fired a bogey-free 66 in the final round and totaled 20-under 264 at the National Capital Open to Support Our Troops to get in a playoff, where he defeated Taylor Pendrith on the first extra hole...Finished the season fourth on the Order of Merit to earn status on the Web.com Tour for 2016.

2014: Was T2 at the Mackenzie Tour Qualifying School in California to earn exempt status...Earned top-10 finish at the ATB Financial Open in his seventh start, with opening rounds of 67-64 (T10)...Moved up the leaderboard with a T7 at the Bayview Place Island Savings Open, the second event of the Mackenzie Tour season.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Earned seven individual wins during his collegiate career at Stetson University...Won the 2012 Atlantic Sun Conference individual championship.
tourBios.personal: Two-time Academic All-American at Stetson University...Enjoys basketball and tennis...Dream foursome would include Tiger Woods, Ben Hogan and Arnold Palmer...Not many people know that he has "a silky jumpshot."

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA T was 1st in 2015 at the National Capital Open to Support Our Troops.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks 13th in Scoring Average (Actual) on the Mackenzie Tour-PGA TOUR Canada.
